intro.title: How Can You Visit Kinmen Without Drinking Kaoliang?
intro.content: A thousand-year tradition, enjoyed wholeheartedly. Let Kinmen liquor get you tipsy.

items.name: The Gentleman
items.ingredients: 58 Kinmen Kaoliang Liquor / Citrus / Lemon / Rosemary

items.name: Number Sixteen
items.ingredients: 58 Kinmen Kaoliang Liquor / Peach / Blood Orange / Mango / Passion Fruit / Pineapple / Lime

items.name: Yan Nan Red
items.ingredients: 58 Kinmen Kaoliang Liquor / Citrus Peel / Quinine / Bitter-sweet

intro.title: Memory in a Glass
intro.content: Each cocktail is a reflection of our past memories, allowing you to chase the beauty of dreams in the aroma of the drink.

items.name: Dreamy Clouds
items.ingredients: Rum / Peach / Pineapple / Raspberry / Lime / Homemade Lemon Syrup

items.name: Mysterious Perfume
items.ingredients: Bourbon Whiskey / Blueberry / Raspberry / Lemon / Mint

items.name: Wendy's Ex
items.ingredients: Earl Grey Vodka / Plum Liqueur / Tonic Water
